special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
Choose one that hasn’t been chosen –
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
• You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
• Target Forest you control becomes a 0/0 green Treefolk. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. It’s still a land.
For each other permanent you control, double the number of each kind of counter on it.
​
